name: Marnielle Lloyd Estrada
text: My former mentor articulately says it well. I'm currently reading a book called Thinking Fast and Slow and it's about the many unusual ways our brain works that goes against rationality. Libingan ng mga Bayani may just be a name but it's a powerful symbol that plays on the intuitive mind. People may say today he's not a hero and LNMB are not specifically for heroes". I'd like to hear the tone in the next 5 years."
